metadata.title: CVE-2023-52522 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net: fix possible store tearing in neigh_periodic_work()While looking at a related syzbot report involving neigh_periodic_work(),I found that I forgot to add an annotation when deleting anRCU protected item from a list.Readers use rcu_deference(*np), we need to use eitherrcu_assign_pointer() or WRITE_ONCE() on writer sideto prevent store tearing.I use rcu_assign_pointer() to have lockdep support,this was the choice made in neigh_flush_dev().

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
